name: Node.js
postCreateCommand: git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions && git clone https://github.com/romkatv/powerlevel10k.git ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/themes/powerlevel10k && git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting && sed -i 's|^ZSH_THEME=".*"$|ZSH_THEME="powerlevel10k/powerlevel10k"|' ~/.zshrc && sed -i 's|^plugins=(.*)$|plugins=(git zsh-autosuggestions zsh-syntax-highlighting)|' ~/.zshrc
